summary: Build a modern, high-conversion B2B SaaS landing page for Softevia targeting the SEO keyword “Market Research Technology in Europe,” positioning Softevia as an AI-powered market research technology provider (not a survey-based agency) with defined sections, CTAs, and SEO terms.
architectural_notes: Landing page must naturally target primary SEO keyword “Market Research Technology in Europe” and include provided related keywords across sections.
Design direction: clean modern SaaS layout with blue/purple gradient accents, AI/analytics-themed illustrations, and dashboard UI mockups.
Position Softevia explicitly as a technology provider (AI market research, predictive analytics, BI, digital market intelligence platform) rather than a traditional survey-based research agency.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Abstract AI analytics illustration with European motif (softevia-hero-illustration.dim_1400x900.png)
- SaaS dashboard UI mockup showing charts, KPIs, and filters (softevia-dashboard-mockup.dim_1600x1000.png)
- Set of 6 minimal line icons for capabilities (insights, customers, benchmarking, predictive, BI, platform) in a consistent style (softevia-capability-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page, modern, high-conversion B2B SaaS landing page for “Softevia” with a clean, professional enterprise look using blue and purple gradient accents, plus AI/analytics-themed visuals.
Implement the exact page structure and section content specified by the user, with user-facing text in English and with the H1 exactly: “Market Research Technology in Europe”.

Add conversion-focused CTAs: wire the “Request a Demo” and “Speak with an Expert” CTAs to open a modal (or dedicated section) with a lead capture form, validate inputs, and show a clear success state after submission.

Optimize the landing page for on-page SEO targeting the exact keyword “Market Research Technology in Europe” by adding appropriate document title, meta description, and visible keyword usage across headings/body while keeping language natural; also include the provided related keywords across the page content.
Add a polished navigation/header and footer suitable for a B2B SaaS landing page, with smooth scroll to sections and persistent access to primary CTA(s).

Add and render required static image assets (illustrations and dashboard mockups) under frontend/public/assets/generated and integrate them into relevant sections (Hero and/or How it Works / Solutions) with proper alt text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Softevia B2B SaaS landing page (content + layout) optimized for the SEO keyword “Market Research Technology in Europe,” including specified sections (hero, evolution, about, 6-feature grid, why choose, industries grid, how it works flow, final CTA) and keyword integration.
Implement backend lead storage in the single Motoko actor: store lead submissions (timestamp, intent, name, email, company, message) and expose a method for the frontend to submit leads.
